name: liminfvald
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsi, c0), csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt)))
-| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cr, cinf(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wceq(cfv(clsi, c0), csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt)), wcel(c0, c2))
stmt.pretty: syl(w0, (liminf ` c0)= sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <), c0 ∈ c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsi, c0), csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c2), wceq(cfv(clsi, c0), csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(liminf ` c0)= sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <))
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ c2 →(liminf ` c0)= sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsi, c0), csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c2), wceq(cfv(clsi, c0), csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(liminf ` c0)= sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <))
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ c2 →(liminf ` c0)= sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c2), wceq(cfv(clsi, c0), csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt)))
-| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cr, cinf(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsi, c0), csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cr, cinf(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: The inferior limit of a set ` F ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
